column4: I'm trying to install openoffice.org2 but apt-get keeps trying to get it from universe when it's been moved to main. how can I clear out the apt-cache?
I'm trying to install openoffice.org2 but apt-get keeps trying to get it from universe when it's been moved to main. how can I clear out the apt-cache?
er, how can I get apt-get to see that openoffice.org2 is now in main and not universe?
you can use synaptic to get openoffice
